repo.description: The most widely used Python to C compiler
repo.name: cython

body:
There's three advantages:
1. We eliminate the use of `PyGILState_Check()` in this case, which is useful for subinterpreters because they can't really work with the `PyGILState` API.
2. On recent Limited API versions we eliminate the need to acquire and release the GIL - we can actually just swap it. This is behind a runtime version check because it's a behaviour rather than API difference.
3. On recent non-Limited API versions we eliminate a check and can just swap it out.

comment_data.body: Can't we store this decision in a `static const` variable?

`__Pyx_get_runtime_version` does already cache the version in a static variable so adding an extra layer of caching one layer out may not gain a lot. 

However, while looking at it, I spotted that `__Pyx_get_runtime_version` actually needs the GIL the first time you call it so isn't quite suitable for use here. Practically I think that's Ok because it is probably called in the module set-up but I should go back and make sure that's really true.
I've explicitly made sure it's always initialized earlier now just so I can mark `__Pyx_get_runtime_version` as "doesn't need the GIL". Practically I think it was fine, but it seems better to be sure

commit.message:
Improve releasing the GIL with an unknown state

There's three advantages:
1. We eliminate the use of `PyGILState_Check()` in this case,
   which is useful for subinterpreters because they can't really
   work with the `PyGILState` API.
2. On recent Limited API versions we eliminate the need to
   acquire and release the GIL - we can actually just swap it.
   This is behind a runtime version check because it's a
   behaviour rather than API difference.
3. On recent non-Limited API versions we eliminate a check and
   can just swap it out.

Split up decl and init for C++

because goto doesn't like jumping across it if it's one line.
Hopefully fix limited API and PyPy
Rewrite to make logic a little clearer

Always set cached_runtime_version at init

so it doesn't require the GIL to get even if not cached.

milestone.description: First feature release after the cleanup releases 3.0 and 3.1.

title: Improve releasing the GIL with an unknown state
